title: BBS give two-month duration to change fate of Sri Lanka
content: The Buddhist hardline organization Bodu Bala Sena (BBS) Friday said that the country’s fate would be changed within two months.  Addressing a press briefing held in Colombo, the secretary of BBS Ven. Galagodaaththe Gnanasara Thero said that a conference of Buddhist monks would be held soon to decide the future action….
